short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus on winning sales deals with this 1-Click Sales Leaderboard that plants trees for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Extension integrates the 1-Click Sales Leaderboard right into Hubspot.

✔️ You get direct access to the Leaderboard right from your Hubspot navigation bar.
✔️ By clicking the new icon in your Hubspot navigation bar, the app opens up in a popup.

If you have not yet integrated the app with your Hubspot account: 
Just install this Extension, click on the new icon in your Hubspot navigation bar and associate the app with your Hubspot account. 

🌲 Win at least one deal and we plant 5 trees for you each month! 

And if you want to plant trees yourself, just upgrade and decide how many trees you want to sponsor each time you win a deal in Hubspot.

❌ No need to create a new account.
❌ No credit card needed. 
❌ No need to visit 3rd party pages

The 1-Click Sales Leaderboard
🔍 increases your focus on winning deals.
🤩 is accessible from within anywhere in Hubspot.
🏆 engages your sales team into a healthy competition.
🌳 plants 5 trees each month for you. 
💪 increases your team's motivation by planting additional trees yourself when you upgrade. 


To see which data we are getting from you when you install the 1-Click Sales Leaderboard with your Hubspot account, please click on the "Privacy Policy" link.
